profile_positions.description:
Yasuni-ITT: Keeping oil underground in the Ecuadorian Amazon, Yasuni, where 2 uncontacted indigenous groups still reside. 

Researching Yasuni-ITT Initiative (Ecuador).
Campaigning & Promoting Yasuni-ITT.

profile_positions.title: Researcher, campaigner & collaborator

volunteer_experiences.description: Yasuni: the most biodiverse place on the planet, rich and abundant in plants, trees, insects, birds, anaconda´s, pink dophins, and indigenous peoples living in voluntary isolation. Join this group, sign the petition, and donate to the Yasuni Campaign to protect it. Contact me for more information.
Advisor to Stichting Klimaatpsychologie on climate behaviour, solutions, and mental health. Writer, networker, speaker.

Ministerie van de Toekomst aims at including future generations in decision making and processes at the local as well as national level in the Netherlands. A Minister activelly supports this goal. Everyone can become a minister of the future.
Member of Argonauts. Joining in in calls, courses, and collaborations. Argonauts is a global network of like minded people to have a positive impact in the world.

Volunteering in Community, Business & Training, and New Member Committees. Gave a workshop in January 2023 on Ego to Eco. Dutch and international meetings and conferences attendee.

Setting up Working Group Sustainbal JCI - in Progress. Contact me for more information.

Worldconnectors / Earth Charter aim to enhance sustainability in social, ecological and economic forms at the national and interntational levels through networking, collaborations, case clinics and courses.
